product_overview: VAYRA is a premium SaaS platform designed to help users overcome debt, build savings, and generate income streams. It combines AI-powered financial coaching, behavioral psychology, and world-class UI/UX design to deliver a polished, emotionally intelligent, and actionable financial planning experience.
core_goals: Deliver a seamless user authentication experience including email/password and Google sign-in with plan-based access control.
Provide a premium, responsive, and accessible UI/UX with multi-language and multi-currency support.
Implement robust dashboard and subscription plan gating to enable tiered feature access.
Ensure high performance and accessibility standards with Lighthouse scores ≥ 90 and zero critical accessibility violations.
Create a PWA-ready app with offline capabilities, installable on Android/iOS devices.
Maintain comprehensive branding consistency across the site with clear logo usage and animations.
key_features: Firebase Authentication System with email/password and Google sign-in, session handling, and plan gating.
Landing Page featuring hero section with animated SVG logo and call-to-action buttons.
Dashboard with responsive layout, sidebar navigation, and subscription-based content access.
Plan Gating and Upgrade flow controlling access to features based on subscription status.
Internationalization using i18next for multi-language support and UI currency switcher for global readiness.
UI Components including buttons, forms, modals, theme and language switchers, with TailwindCSS styling and dark/light mode support.
Progressive Web App features: manifest, service worker, icons, and offline caching.
Error handling with error boundaries and dedicated pages for not found and general errors.
Accessibility enhancements including keyboard navigation, focus rings, alt text for logos, and WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the homepage, sees a single animated VAYRA logo above the hero headline, with responsive layout and clear CTAs.
User navigates to authentication pages (Sign In / Sign Up), views a compact centered logo, can sign in via email or Google, and receives friendly error messages on failure.
Upon successful authentication, user is directed to the dashboard; free users are redirected to the Upgrade page to manage subscriptions.
Users can upgrade their plan via the Upgrade page, unlocking additional features based on their subscription tier.
App UI updates dynamically for selected language and currency, and respects user preferences such as reduced motion and theme selection.
Users can install the app as a PWA with proper manifest and icon support, enabling offline usage and home screen access.
validation_criteria: Landing page shows exactly one crisp VAYRA logo above the hero H1 with fade+scale animation and no layout shift.
Header logo links to homepage and is visible on all pages including authentication.
Google sign-in button functional with popup and friendly error messaging for unauthorized domains.
Plan gating redirects free users away from restricted dashboard content to the Upgrade page.
PWA manifest and icon files return HTTP 200, and PWA install prompt uses maskable icons.
Lighthouse mobile and desktop scores ≥ 90 for Performance, Accessibility, Best Practices, and SEO on critical pages (/ and /dashboard).
Accessibility audits yield zero critical issues on homepage and authentication pages.
Console logs across navigation are free from errors and warnings.
Responsive UI verified on mobile (375×812) and desktop (1280×800) viewports with no CLS or overlapping elements.
